content: The other thing to bear in mind, Chad is that the largest part of our of our leisure business is actually the pub business and whatever and I think itâs unlikely, but whatever letâs say lessening of the snap back in the travel driven part is going to be more than made up for by the pub business, just because as all of the COVID stuff finally once and for all goes away and people are comfortable going out to pubs and so forth that I think the overall picture is we're pretty sanguine that the â when we add up all the pluses and minuses at the pluses on the leader business, particularly because of what we're seeing in the pub business is â it's coming out clearly on the plus side.
